comment: Thanks for sharing this Matt. It's great to see that a lot of the things that people are asking for match up with some of the stuff I'd like to see. I have only been using the app for a few weeks but already love it. I hope you are able to find ways to harness the support of the Buckets community of users to help you with tasks that can help move the development of the app and its support documentation forward. All the best to you - you have done great stuff so far an I am excited to see what more comes!
name: Will
